bug.author: houstonlucas
bug.summary: Small typo in Deep MNIST Tutorial
bug.description:
There is a small typo on the <denchmark-link:http://tensorflow.org/tutorials/mnist/pros/index.md>Deep MNIST for Experts</denchmark-link> page. It's the first sentence of the second paragraph under the Start TensorFlow InteractiveSession header.
Here we instead use the convenience InteractiveSession class, ...
should maybe be
Here we instead use the convenient InteractiveSession class,...
or maybe
Here we instead use the convenience of the InteractiveSession class, ...
